snippet.title: Little Bug Fig Campaign Trailer
snippet.description:
This is footage from our proof of concept demo. The full game was crowdfunded in February 2017 on Fig.co! Stay tuned, Little Bug is being rebuilt from the ground up for a full release in Summer 2018 on Steam for Mac, PC and Linux (more platforms TBA).

Become a backer today: https://www.fig.co/campaigns/little-bug
Contact the developer: http://buddysystem.la
